name: Viral
description:
Viral aims to become the next global blockchain social media powerhouse, while simultaneously providing investors with income generating utilities in their all-in-one app.

Thanks to revolutionary tokenomics, users can supply VIRAL LP in exchange for VIRAL TOKEN on #ViralApp, leading to an ever-increasing liquidity pool and profits for investors. #VIRAL holders and market makers alike are incentivize by a first-of-its-kind mechanic, claim #VIRAL after providing VIRAL LP. 'Providing LP' for many holders can often be at no additional expense thanks to the 5% VIRAL LP redistribution tax in the contract.
